name: Killing Time
description: A sophisticated shooter laced with gallows humor. Killing Time is no shallow grave. Its depth is well-conceived. Puzzle solving and strategic thinking are placed at a premium.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 3.1 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
